name: contracts
description: Package for web3 related code like contracts and utils

scripts.deploy:superchain-points:optimism-sepoli: npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SuperchainPoints.ts --parameters ignition/parameters/optimism-sepolia.json --network optimism-sepolia --strategy create2 --verify
scripts.wipe:superchain-points:optimism-sepolia: npx hardhat ignition wipe chain-11155420 SuperchainPointsModule#SuperchainPoints
scripts.deploy:superchain-badges:optimism-sepoli: npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SuperchainBadges.ts --parameters ignition/parameters/optimism-sepolia.json --network optimism-sepolia --strategy create2 --verify
scripts.wipe:superchain-badges:optimism-sepolia: npx hardhat ignition wipe chain-11155420 SuperchainBadgesModule#SuperchainBadges
scripts.deploy:superchain-points-raffle-factory:: npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SuperchainPointsRaffleFactory.ts --parameters ignition/parameters/optimism-sepolia.json --strategy create2 --network optimism-sepolia --verify
npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SuperchainPointsRaffleFactory.ts --parameters ignition/parameters/base-sepolia.json --strategy create2 --network base-sepolia --verify
npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SuperchainPointsRaffleFactory.ts --parameters ignition/parameters/unichain-sepolia.json --strategy create2 --network unichain-sepolia --verify
